mixed-citation.article-title: Review of the genus Chinoperla Zwick, 1980 (Plecoptera: Perlidae: Perlinae) from China

tp:nomenclature.tp:taxon-name: Chinoperla biprojecta Lü, Yan, Li & Wang, 2019

tp:treatment-sec.p:
Chinoperla biprojecta
Lü et al. , 2019a: 187
, figs 1–2 (original description of the male).

CHINA • 1 ♂ ; Hainan Province , Changjiang County , Bawangling National Forest Park ; 19°15′1.44″ N , 109°2′2.4″ E ; alt.
1000 m
;
9–10 Jun. 2007
; Jie Zeng leg.; HIST
.
China : Hainan Province , Ledong and Changjiang Counties.

This species is characterized by the median sclerite of tergum 9 forming an inverted triangle bearing two finger-shaped posterolateral projections. The aedeagus of the present specimen agrees well with the type material.
